alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 7:38PM EST until December 28 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snowfall of up to one inch and a glaze of ice. * WHERE...Portions of central and southern Vermont and northern New York. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will mix with and change to freezing drizzle at times. Ice accretion expected to be less than 0.01".
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
